data.eml:eml: Barsine amaculata, a new species from Vietnam (Lepidoptera, Erebidae, Arctiinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Volynkin, Anton V., Černý, Karel (2016): Barsine amaculata, a new species from Vietnam (Lepidoptera, Erebidae, Arctiinae). Zootaxa 4200 (2): 345-350, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4200.2.11
